attributes.additional_details: Mr Pickles seems to think 100 million pounds on getting all our bins emptied weekly is far more important than keeping Sure Start running as well as other vital local services for the elderley & disabled. Apparently its all our rights to have the remains of our Tikka Masala taken away weekly; but nevermind if the vulnerable suffer.He supports Localism.. let him prove it & give the money back to deprived local areas!
